meta_description: Greentrike powers the Children's Museum of Tacoma, Children's Museum at JBLM, Play to Learn, the Monarch Diaper Bank, and early learning programs in Pierce County!
hours_text:
Visit[Shaun Parker](https://greentrike.org/author/sparkerplaytacoma-org "Posts by Shaun Parker")2023-12-21T16:10:34-08:00

# Come Play With Us

# Play, Create, and Learn at Your Museum

# Visit us in Tacoma and on Joint Base Lewis-McChord

[](https://greentrike.org/childrens-museum-of-tacoma)

##### [Children’s Museum of Tacoma](https://greentrike.org/childrens-museum-of-tacoma)

The Children’s Museum of Tacoma features five nature-inspired playscapes, an art studio with supplies, a little library full of children’s books, and much more. The Museum is designed to encourage playful experiences for children ages birth to 12. Every visit is Pay As You Will, a donation-only admission model that ensures access to play for all families.

[Come play](https://greentrike.org/childrens-museum-of-tacoma)

[](https://greentrike.org/playjblm)

##### [Children’s Museum at JBLM](http://greentrike.org/playjblm)

In partnership with Joint Base Lewis-McChord (JBLM), the first ever children’s museum on a military installation will open April 24, 2021. This new location will continue to build upon relationships established through the Play to Learn programming on JBLM, and will be designed to serve children and their families, with an emphasis on early learners, those experiencing special needs, and reintegration of our military into family life.

[Come play](https://greentrike.org/playjblm)

[Come play](https://greentrike.org/childrens-museum-of-tacoma)

[Come play](https://greentrike.org/playj...

collections_text:
Honor Children and Youth. Champion Play.[Shaun Parker](https://greentrike.org/author/sparkerplaytacoma-org "Posts by Shaun Parker")2025-12-12T15:13:23-08:00

# Greentrike

Honor Children. Champion Play.

# Greentrike

Honor Children.  
Champion Play.

Greentrike is a nonprofit that advocates for and models equitable access to playful experiences for children, youth, and families — because play is essential for learning, joy, and a thriving community.

## 40 Years of Play

Celebrate our 40th birthday with us throughout 2025, a milestone of 40 years of play for the Children’s Museum of Tacoma. From our early start at community events to our expansion of access programs countywide, Greentrike continues the Children’s Museum of Tacoma’s legacy to make childhood more playful and joyful in our community.

## What is Greentrike?

Greentrike powers the [Children’s Museum of Tacoma](https://greentrike.org/childrens-museum-of-tacoma), the [Children’s Museum at JBLM](https://greentrike.org/playjblm), [Play to Learn](https://greentrike.org/play-to-learn), [Preschool Powered by Play](https://greentrike.org/preschool), [Expanded Learning Opportunities](https://greentrike.org/osti), [Cares Kits](https://greentrike.org/programs/in-our-community/greentrikecares), [the Monarch Diaper Bank](https://greentrike.org/programs/monarch-diaper-bank), and many [play-based learning experiences](https://greentrike.org/events/month) across Pierce County.
